item.title: More Python Fiddlework
item.description: Recently I came across a wonderful YouTube Channel, Arjan Codes, and I have already learned a great deal from many of his videos, tutorials, etc. (In particular, I found his video on the use of type hinting in Python to be incredibly helpful, and I have already started to implement some of his suggestions in my own code.) Wanting to just try it out I figured I would put a pretty simple snippet of code that is part of my ever-continuing enjoyment of working with our Canvas LMS solely through the APIâ€”trying never to open a web browser.
